title: Development Officers on Sick Leave
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Development Officers Union stated that it would resort to trade union action by reporting sick on Monday (14) to protest against the failure to solve their salary anomaly issues.
Chandana Sooriyarachchi, the Secretary of the Trade Union stated that severl other trade unions are also supporting the move.
Cut taxes on fuel, says Gammanpila while asking why SLPP is silent on price hike?
